summary: Diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo and project_state.json, but the provided truncated excerpts do not include any evidence of one-time new-user seeding of non-quadrant custom lists named exactly “Week” and “Month”, nor any safeguards ensuring they are not recreated later. No unrequested features are clearly evidenced in the truncated diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: On first-time user creation (principal seen for the first time), automatically create two empty, normal (non-quadrant) custom lists owned by the user named exactly “Week” and “Month” with quadrant=false, urgent=false, important=false; applies to all authenticated users and runs only on one-time user creation.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated backend/main.mo diff excerpt only shows existing types and an addQuadrantIfMissing helper; it does not show any new-user creation lifecycle changes or list-seeding logic for “Week”/“Month”.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated excerpt shows addQuadrantIfMissing only; no onboarding list seeding visible)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure backend never auto-recreates “Week” and/or “Month” for existing users after initial creation (no per-login/per-fetch repair; deletion/rename persists; quadrant initialization does not restore them).
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the truncated diff excerpt of logic preventing recreation or ensuring onboarding lists are only created during initial user creation.
evidence: backend/main.mo (truncated; no logic shown about avoiding recreation of Week/Month)
